name: Vallant
description:
THE GAME WILL BE FIXED AS SOON AS POSSIBLE

Thanks to TampusFugit and ElectricMammoth for participating to the development of this project.

Developers : Weact, TampusFugit

Level Designer : ElectricMammoth

Game Design : Lucas "Weact", Luc "TampusFugit", Joffrey "ElectricMammoth"

Made within the scope Ludus Academie December 2021 Game Jam.

Synopsis

Make your way in a fairy world and defeat Vallant, the enemy of your land

Goal

Find each animal totem to get their power and beat Vallant.

Combat system does not work at this stage of the game.

Controls

ZQSD/WASDand Space

Double tap Z/W : Air Spell, Double Tap S : Earth Spell

Double Tap Q/A or D : Fire Spell

NOTE: ALL ARTS USED IN THE GAME ARE NOT MADE BY US. THEY WERE TAKEN FOR FREE OR BOUGHT FROM ITCH.IO ASSETS AND THE GAME WILL CHANGE A LOT IN THE FUTURE.

Tilesets and character by : Maaot on Itch.io
